title: Facebook Advertising for Beginners
headline: Free online course on how to launch your Facebook Ad campaign and target your ideal Facebook audience.
description: This free online course, Facebook Ads for beginners, covers everything you need to know in order to get started with Facebook Ad campaigns the right way. This online course cuts through all the fog and gives you a clear guide to exactly what you need to do in order to get your first Facebook Ad campaign up and running. You'll learn how to find your ideal audience on Facebook, avoid the common mistakes made by new advertisers, and more.

courseDescription:
Running your first Facebook Ads campaign can seem daunting. There are so many different aspects to setting up the campaign, not to mention the pitfalls that can lead to your ads being disapproved, or even ending up with a banned account. This free online course Facebook Ads for Beginners shows you that the good news is that although it may seem complicated to create and run ads on Facebook, it's actually quite simple once you know how!

This online course is designed for complete beginners and is presented in an accessible manner. During the training you will learn how to set up a new Facebook page, and get that page ready for running ads. You will also learn how to find your target audience on Facebook, as well as find and create eye catching images for your ad. You will also learn how to write short ad headlines and text as well as set up and launch the campaign.

As Facebook has clear Ad Policies and Terms of Use you will also learn how to avoid the pitfalls that can lead to banned advertising accounts. Pulling all this pieces together should lead to the creation of a very successful Facebook Ads Campaign! Enroll in this online course today and start learning how to set up a new page, create ads, find your target audience, advertise on facebook and run ad campaigns.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will find out what to expect from the course and learn about how the course is structured.
topics: Introduction to Facebook Ads for Beginners

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module teaches you the important basics of Facebook advertising. Including the rules surrounding Facebook pages. You will also see an example of a good ad versus a not-so-good ad!
topics: Basic Information and Rules that Apply to Facebook Advertising

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Getting Ready to Run Facebook Ad Campaigns
modules.description: In this module you will get everything ready to start running ads. Here's what you will be doing: Installing the Facebook Pixel Setting up a Facebook page for business Running a Facebook 'Likes' campaign to get credibility for your new page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn how to set up a 'custom conversion' for your ad. Custom conversions allow you to see how your ad is performing

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module teaches you how to make sure your landing page is compliant with Facebook's advertising policies. The landing page is the page that you want people to go to when they click on your Facebook ad.
topics: Making Sure Your Landing Page Does Not Break Facebook's Rules

modules.name: Module
modules.description: There are multiple different types of Facebook ad. In this module you will learn about each type of ad.
topics: Single Image Ad, Video Ad, Messenger Ad, and More

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Facebook has a great free tool available to advertisers called 'Audience Insights'. In this module you will learn how to use Audience Insights to find your audience on Facebook. These are the people you will be advertising to.

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Set up the Campaign and Launch the Ad
modules.description: In this module you will be setting up the Facebook ads campaign and launching the ad. You will learn how to navigate the 'Ads Manager' platform, how to add a 'saved audience' to the campaign, how to set a budget, how to add the image, write the ad text, and everything else!

modules.name: Module
topics: Facebook Advertising for Beginners - Course assessment
